versions.localizedDescription:
AltStore is an alternative app store for non-jailbroken devices. 

This version of AltStore allows you to install Delta, an all-in-one emulator for iOS, as well as sideload other .ipa files from the Files app.

permissions.usageDescription: AltStore periodically refreshes apps in the background to prevent them from expiring.
Allows AltStore to run longer than 30 seconds when refreshing apps in background.

privacy.name: LocalNetwork
privacy.usageDescription: AltStore uses the local network to find and communicate with AltServer.

versions.localizedDescription:
‚Ä¢ Fixed crash when loading save states on iOS 17
‚Ä¢ Fixed displaying system name in dark text when remapping inputs on iOS 17

‚Ä¢ Fixed translucent controller skins resetting opacity after rotating device
‚Ä¢ Fixed incorrect thumbstick size after rotating device

NEW

CheatBase (thanks Noah Keck @horn978)
‚Ä¢ Browse and add all known cheats for supported games
‚Ä¢ Limited to DS games for now, but will be expanded in the future

‚ÄúRespect Silent Mode‚Äù setting
‚Ä¢ When enabled, game audio will only play when your device isn‚Äôt muted
‚Ä¢ Automatically mutes game audio if another app is playing audio

‚ÄúContributors‚Äù screen
‚Ä¢ See everyone who has contributed to Delta
‚Ä¢ View associated Pull Requests for contributed features

IMPROVED
‚Ä¢ Automatically pauses + resumes emulation when switching between foreground apps with Stage Manager
‚Ä¢ Uses modern menu UI when importing games
‚Ä¢ Updated "Copy Deep Link" icon when sharing a game

FIXED
‚Ä¢ Fixed error sharing games via certain share methods
‚Ä¢ Fixed exporting save files for games with names containing special characters
‚Ä¢ Fixed using Xbox controller analog sticks as D-pad inputs
‚Ä¢ Fixed incorrect font size for Credits section in Settings

appPermissions.versionDescription:
‚Ä¢ Fixed crash when loading save states on iOS 17
‚Ä¢ Fixed displaying system name in dark text when remapping inputs on iOS 17
appPermissions.localizedDescription:
Delta is an all-in-one emulator for iOS. Delta builds upon the strengths of its predecessor, GBA4iOS, while expanding to include support for more game systems such as NES, SNES, and N64.

FEATURES

Supported Game Systems
‚Ä¢ Nintendo Entertainment System
‚Ä¢ Super Nintendo Entertainment System
‚Ä¢ Nintendo 64
‚Ä¢ Game Boy (Color)
‚Ä¢ Game Boy Advance
‚Ä¢ Nintendo DS
‚Ä¢ And plenty more to come!

Controller Support
‚Ä¢ Supports PS4, PS5, Xbox One S, Xbox Series X, and MFi game controllers.
‚Ä¢ Supports bluetooth (and wired) keyboards, as well as the Apple Smart Keyboard.
‚Ä¢ Completely customize button mappings on a per-system, per-controller basis.
‚Ä¢ Map buttons to special ‚ÄúQuick Save‚Äù, ‚ÄúQuick Load,‚Äù and ‚ÄúFast Forward‚Äù actions.

Save States
‚Ä¢ Save and load save states for any game from the pause menu.
‚Ä¢ Lock save states to prevent them from being accidentally overwritten.
‚Ä¢ Automatically makes backup save states to ensure you never lose your progress.
‚Ä¢ Support for ‚ÄúQuick Saves,‚Äù save states that can be quickly saved/loaded with a single button press (requires external controller).

Cheats
‚Ä¢ Supports various types of cheat codes for each supported system:
‚Ä¢ NES: Game Genie
‚Ä¢ SNES: Game Genie, Pro Action Replay
‚Ä¢ N64: GameShark
‚Ä¢ GBC: Game Genie, GameShark
‚Ä¢ GBA: Action Replay, Code Breaker, GameShark
‚Ä¢ DS: Action Replay

Delta Sync
‚Ä¢ Sync your games, game saves, save states, cheats, controller skins, and controller mappings between devices.
‚Ä¢ View version histories of everything you sync and optionally restore them to earlier versions.
‚Ä¢ Supports both Google Drive and Dropbox.

Custom Controller Skins
‚Ä¢ Beautiful built-in controller skins for all systems.
‚Ä¢ Import controller skins made by others, or even make your own to share with the world!

Hold Button
‚Ä¢ Choose buttons for Delta to hold down on your behalf, freeing up your thumbs to press other buttons instead.
‚Ä¢ Perfect for games that typically require one button be held down constantly (ex: run button in Mario games, or the A button in Mario Kart).

Fast Forward
‚Ä¢ Speed through slower parts of games by running the game much faster than normal.
‚Ä¢ Easily enable or disable from the pause menu, or optionally with a mapped button on an external controller.

3D/Haptic Touch
‚Ä¢ Use 3D or Haptic Touch to ‚Äúpeek‚Äù at games, save states, and cheat codes.
‚Ä¢ App icon shortcuts allow quick access to your most recently played games, or optionally customize the shortcuts to always include certain games.

Game Artwork
‚Ä¢ Automatically displays appropriate box art for imported games.
‚Ä¢ Change a game‚Äôs artwork to anything you want, or select from the built-in game artwork database.

Misc.
‚Ä¢ Gyroscope support (WarioWare: Twisted! only)
‚Ä¢ Microphone support (DS only)
‚Ä¢ Support for delta:// URL scheme to jump directly into a specific game.

**Delta and AltStore LLC are in no way affiliated with Nintendo. The name "Nintendo" and all associated game console names are registered trademarks of Nintendo Co., Ltd.**

appPermissions.subtitle: Ï£ºÎ®∏Îãà ÏÜç Í≥†Ï††Í≤åÏûÑ.

versions.localizedDescription:
IMPROVED

Delta Sync
‚Ä¢ Added detailed logging to help debug issues
‚Ä¢ View complete error log via "Export Error Log" option in Settings

Misc.
‚Ä¢ Shows AirPlay icon when AirPlaying
‚Ä¢ Added "Learn More" links to FAQ thoughout app

FIXED

iPad
‚Ä¢ Fixed crash when changing DS emulator core
‚Ä¢ Fixed incorrectly indented rows on MelonDS core settings screen
‚Ä¢ Fixed not rounding last visible row in MelonDS core settings

‚ö†Ô∏è This beta fixes a critical bug that could cause corrupted save files and save states to be uploaded to Google Drive/Dropbox.

Please update ASAP to ensure you don't lose any data. You can read more about this bug fix in today's Patreon post.

IMPROVED

Delta Sync
‚Ä¢ Automatically resolves cheat + controller skin sync conflicts
‚Ä¢ Syncs game save hash between devices to prevent redundant uploads
‚Ä¢ Displays activity indicator when signing in
‚Ä¢ Delays seeding sync database until initial sync
‚Ä¢ Uses local modification date when uploading changes
‚Ä¢ Signs out from previous service when switching services
‚Ä¢ Improved error message when remote storage is out of free space (Dropbox only)

Settings
‚Ä¢ Revised UI to use modern "inset grouped" style
‚Ä¢ Uses large titles where appropriate

Misc.
‚Ä¢ Replaces `UIDocumentBrowserViewController` with `UIDocumentPickerViewController` on iOS 17+
‚Ä¢ Skips checksum verification when importing zipped games

FIXED

Delta Sync
‚Ä¢ Fixed incorrect mass conflicts when signing out then back in
‚Ä¢ Fixed ‚ÄúHarmony.sqlite couldn‚Äôt be opened‚Äù sync error when there are more than 1000 games
‚Ä¢ Fixed ‚Äúfile does not exist‚Äù sync error after restoring previous version
‚Ä¢ Fixed Delta Sync switch remaining OFF if users cancels "Disable Syncing?" warning alert
‚Ä¢ Fixed missing references to remote files when signing out then back in
‚Ä¢ Fixed queued syncs sometimes fetching outdated changes
‚Ä¢ Fixed accidentally using wrong account when signed-in to multiple services

iPad
‚Ä¢ Fixed crash when resolving Delta Sync merge conflicts
‚Ä¢ Fixed crash when disabling Delta Sync or switching services

Experimental Features
‚Ä¢ Fixed saving screenshots to Photos with .limited authorization
‚Ä¢ Fixed saving screenshots to Photos as JPEGs

Misc.
‚Ä¢ Fixed accidentally deleting Games directory during sync in rare circumstances
‚Ä¢ Fixed crash loading save states on iOS 17
‚Ä¢ Fixed displaying system name in dark text when remapping inputs on iOS 17

NEW

AirPlay Support 
‚Ä¢ Stream your games to the big screen with AirPlay
‚Ä¢ [DS] Optionally AirPlay just top screen for true multi-screen experience

Experimental Features
‚Ä¢ New section in Settings for features by third-party contributors
‚Ä¢ Features are WIP and should be used at user‚Äôs discretion

Initial Experimental Features
‚Ä¢ Show Status Bar: View time/WiFi/battery while playing a game (@LitRitt)
‚Ä¢ Game Screenshots: Take screenshots from pause menu (@LitRitt)
‚Ä¢ In-Game Notifications: Show pop-up alerts when performing certain actions (@LitRitt)
‚Ä¢ AirPlay Skins: Customize appearance of games on TV when AirPlaying
‚Ä¢ Variable Fast Forward: Change the Fast Forward speed per-system

FIXED
‚Ä¢ Fixed translucent controller skins resetting opacity after rotating device
‚Ä¢ Fixed incorrect thumbstick size after rotating device

Local Multiplayer (thanks Ian Clawson @ThatClawsonBoy!)
‚Ä¢ Play NES, SNES, N64, and Genesis games with friends
‚Ä¢ Supports up to 4 players

Improved Non-MFi Controller Support
‚Ä¢ New default mappings for single Joy-Cons and Switch NES/SNES controllers
‚Ä¢ Uses Logo/Home button as Delta pause button if possible

"Contributors" screen
‚Ä¢ See everyone who has contributed to Delta
‚Ä¢ View associated Pull Requests for contributed features

PREVIOUS BETA
‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúRespect Silent Mode‚Äù setting
‚Ä¢ Automatically mutes game audio if another app is playing audio
‚Ä¢ Browse CheatBase for all known cheats for games (thanks Noah Keck @horn978)

The next consoles for Delta are coming: this beta version of Delta brings support for playing Nintendo DS and Sega Genesis games!

Please report any issues you find to support@altstore.io. Thanks!

appPermissions.localizedDescription:
Clip is a simple clipboard manager for iOS. 

Unlike other clipboard managers, Clip can continue monitoring your clipboard while in the background. No longer do you need to remember to manually open or share to an app to save your clipboard; just copy and paste as you would normally do, and Clip will have your back.

In addition to background monitoring, Clip also has these features:

‚Ä¢ Save text, URLs, and images copied to the clipboard.
‚Ä¢ Copy, delete, or share any clippings saved to Clip.
‚Ä¢ Customizable history limit.

Download Clip today, and never worry about losing your clipboard again!

permissions.usageDescription: Allows Clip to continuously monitor your clipboard in the background.

appPermissions.name: Clip
appPermissions.subtitle: Manage your clipboard history with ease.
appPermissions.versionDescription:
This update adds a Custom Keyboard app extension for quick access to clippings when editing text.

To enable the keyboard, go to Settings > General > Keyboard > Keyboards > Add New Keyboard... and add "ClipBoard". Once added, make sure to then enable "Allow Full Access" for ClipBoard so it can access your clippings.
appPermissions.localizedDescription:

In addition to background monitoring, Clip also has these features:

Download Clip today, and never worry about losing your clipboard again!
